ai-tha-ap465:1.3_0: Having taken a smell of water, water, a smell,
ai-tha-ap465:1.4_0: I’ve disillusioned and dispassionate regarding it,
ai-tha-ap465:2.2_0: I’ve disillusioned and dispassionate regarding it,
ai-tha-ap465:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap465:4.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap465:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Saṅgārava.
ai-tha-ap465:7.1_0: The third chapter on finding faults
